channel.title: Okta Basics :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Basics Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes The Okta Basics section gives new-to-IAM or new-to-Okta developers an introduction to Okta-specific basic concepts that they will need to build solutions that integrate with Okta. About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: Respondents with an IAM experience level lower than 5 say that the developer docs “Needs improvement” Respondents with IAM experience level lower that 5 say that they rarely come to the site See Learn (ID: 1)

item.title: Okta Identity Engine
item.description: Okta Identity Engine Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Article title change After reading this doc it is rather outdated. We should update this doc and mention Okta’s latest offerings (OIG, PAM, etc) Also even calling it Identity Engine seems rather dated.

item.title: The Okta org
item.description: The Okta org Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Doc needs a thorough review and possibly updated to include new org features. Links to original docs: Okta organizations: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/okta-organizations/ Why is this here?

item.title: Find your Okta Domain
item.description: Find your Okta Domain Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Add reasons why you need to know or use this “Okta domain” Links to original docs: Find your Okta domain: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/find-your-domain/main/ Page type: Task

item.title: Find your application credentials
item.description: Find your application credentials Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Add reasons why you need to know or use the “Application credentials” Links to original docs: Find your application credentials: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/find-your-app-credentials/ Page type: Task

item.title: Admin console
item.description: Admin console Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: An overview of the Admin console for developers. There is currently no equivalent doc on help.okta.com for admin users. Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: Global session and authentication policies
item.description: Global session and authentication policies Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: Summary overview of the different types of policy that combine to form an authentication ruleset Global session policy Authentication policy Enrollment policy Links to original docs: First section in Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.

item.title: Okta APIs
item.description: Okta APIs Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: Summary overview of the different sets of Okta APIs and their purpose. Links to the API reference section on Redocly. Why is this here?: At the Oktane MatchIt game, 35.5% of respondents could not define Okta APIs.

item.title: Okta SDKs
item.description: Okta SDKs Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: This page briefly describes the existing, supported Okta SDKs, and redirects the reader to Reference > SDKs where more information is given. Why is this here?: Internal workshop session: Session 1 - Team 1 chose the Custom App SDKs group.

item.title: Okta Sign-in Widget
item.description: Okta Sign-in Widget Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: In the Oktane GroupIt game, the Embedded Sign-in Widget was placed in a significant amount of groups, which may indicate disagreement over the meaning. Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.
